text: Getty In Touch adds that both duchesses, 36, are preparing to raise the royal cousins together. The insider spilled,'Kate and Meghan bonded over the men they married. Now they're bonding over being pregnant together.'Despite the two wanting to share the exciting news with the world, In Touch's bombshell report reveals the two women have only disclosed to friends and family. Related : Kate Middleton and Prince William expecting fourth child Related : Meghan and Harry's twin joy Getty On top of the exciting news, Meghan feels an'enormous relief.''
